inclusion.criterion: implanted with implantable cardioverter defibrillator (ICD) or cardiac resynchronization therapy cardioverter defibrillator (CRT-D)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patients planned for 3D mapping and radiofrequency ablation of ventricular tachycardia
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: patients who are able to understand and sign informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with combined mechanical aortic and mitral valve prostheses
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with RF ablation of VT done in the last 12 months
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with known damaged ICD/CRT-D electrode or battery
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients undergoing VT ablation who have not been implanted with ICD or CRT-D
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients not willing or able to undergo clinical follow-up of ICD/CRT-D device
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Not able to understand or willing to sign informed consent
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has history of CAD, MI, HLD, HTN, ventricular tachycardia, and syncope. Patient was recently discharged after a negative work-up for syncope which included the implantation of a cardiac monitoring device.
